name: Rezrog
description: Test your fighting spirit as you take your party of brave adventurers on an epic quest to restore peace to the lands of Rezrog in this table-top inspired, turn-based, dungeon crawler. Upgrade your skills & tactically exploit enemy weaknesses as you try to handle everything the dungeons will throw at you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM Storage: 4 GB available space
